channel.title: Project insanity --> Model reqeust. -->read please
channel.description:
can any one give me all models for raw folder, i added it, try'ed to load data out of cache but it cant export some please can any one give me?
mvg danny

item.title: Project insanity --> Model reqeust. -->read please
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Your code should look like this:
if(i == 11526) {
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 44590;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660;//anInt165
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43600;//anInt200
itemDef.modelZoom = 789;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23;
itemDef.name = “Dragon claws”;
itemDef.description = “A set of fighting claws.”.getBytes();
}

Add the ints to itemdef The ints go after this:

/* Hardcoded items start here */
/**/

Just find it in itemdef.

Read full topic
